data.title: Karan Singh Grover was slapped by his second wife
data.meta_description: Star Karan Singh Grover, who made his debut in the TV industry, is celebrating his 39th birthday today. Karan was born on February 23, 1982.... | News Track
data.text:
Star Karan Singh Grover, who made his debut in the TV industry, is celebrating his 39th birthday today. Karan was born on February 23, 1982. However, Karan has been in discussions more than his work less than his affair. She has done three weddings so far, which have been from well-known actresses. Talking about the first marriage, he was first married to actress Shraddha Nigam. Both of them got married in the year 2008. This marriage was not seen to last long. The two separated in 2009. In 2012, after the break up of this marriage, Karan married Jennifer Winget. Jennifer is a great actress and people love her shows a lot. However, the marriage of these two could not last for long.

The two divorced in 2016. After getting divorced from Jennifer, Karan married Bipasha Basu and today both are living a happy life. It is said that Karan's first wife Shraddha Nigam had also caught Karan red-handed several times while he was engaged in flirting with other girls. Even after this, she kept giving her marriage a chance, but once something happened that Shraddha broke the marriage. Yes, once Karan Singh Grover's name was associated with the choreographer Nicole of the reality show 'Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa'. During that time, Karan also publicly confessed to loving Nicole.

After all this, Shraddha divorces Karan. It is said that Karan's second marriage was also broken due to this reason. He did not give time to Jennifer and lived with other girls. Once, Jennifer had caught Karan with a girl on the set of 'Dil Mil Gaye'. She then slaps Karan in front of everyone. Shortly after that both of them got divorced. By the way, Karan is now living a good life by marrying Bipasha Basu, 4 years older than himself.
